basics.title: now
basics.info: date-fns uses native date wherever possible

basics.title: string
basics.info: Accepts ISO 8601 format but will attempt to parse any other inputs

basics.title: format
basics.warning: Parsing with a format will only be available in version 2

basics.title: UTC
basics.info: date-fns uses native date wherever possible, open issue to add better support for UTC dates in date-fns
